comments.commentBody: All of those things, but especially Bernie's early demonization of Hillary,  conspired to convince a good number of Bernie Brats, whose lack of knowledge about Civics,, History, and Logic were shocking.  to withhold their votes, out of stupidity.  They are all related.  Had they not done that Clinton would have won the electoral college.

So Democrats had opposition research on Trump that they did not use.

Why didn't Hillary use it, if it is such good stuff?

Perhaps it was unreliable. That idea brings to mind Dan Rather's report on W's Air National Guard behavior, and the blowback that came of its failure.

Perhaps fear of retaliation? So then, what did Trump have on Hillary that he did not use?

Trump is not the only one who stands to come out of this looking very bad.
Those lies that Rather repeated were a low point for journalism. As Dan himself might have said "if a rabbit ain't jumpin', it's a possum". Or something stupid like that...

While Trump in Trouble
Print "Benghazi. Benghazi. Benghazi "
Wend

Christine McM -- "You have to drag Hillary into this, don't you?"

This is her opposition research.

She did not use it, but now it is leaked after the election.

That is a fair question, not dragging her into something that has nothing to do with her.
Ja. It vas rigged.
Really? They're still talking about the emails? I would think that they have more urgent concerns.

Have you conveniently forgotten that Mitch McConnell stated, after Obama's
inauguration in 2009, that the job of the Republicans in Congress was to make sure the President only served one term? Do you think that was "dignified and professional"?

You guys need to get it straight.  The majority of Democratic voters supported Hillary.  We saw Bernie's slogans and stump speech for what they were...phony rhetoric meant to appeal to a lot of children.  Bernie would have been squashed like a fly going against Trump.   Nobody stole anything.  You guys were taken in by a demagogue, who could have accomplished none of his promises of freebies for all of you.  Those who stupidly withheld their votes or voted for a third party gave this to Trump.

Collectively we need to learn that our actions have consequences. Such tests of maturity either benefit an advancing civilization or are repeated in varying contexts, until learned. That's how we all learn mature cooperation, and how we learn collectively as well. Mr. Trump will likely bring a ton of sunlight into some of America's darkest impulses, for us to see and consider.

Mr. Trump will have his ego-stage, the would-be manipulators their opportunities, the loyal opposition their resistance for other than pearls, and we, the living, can hope the consequences are not violent tests.

We need to understand who we are collectively in order to see who we want to become.
Just my point. The Confederate States of America have won the Civil War or as they say... The War Between the States..

I think the Civil War was a mistake. States have the right to secede. We should have let them go. Let them have their states' rights.

I believe Congress and the Supreme Court should make it easier for them to secede. The U.S. would be much better off without Mississippi, Alabama, Louisiana and Texas. I only would be sorry to lose New Orleans and Austin. Perhaps we could have a population exchange with Staten Island.

The only problem is refugees and immigrants. I think we should allow southerners into the U.S. provided they demonstrate that they are willing to accept the Bill of Rights and to assimilate and adopt American ways.
conway is just a hired mouthpiece, not a good person, but not as foul as trump and sessions.

Today Dylan Roof, a 22 year old mentally ill, racist was given the death penalty. 22 years old.  What a waste of a life. But it has been lost in the political rhetoric. Nine innocent people died! Mr. Sessions, Mr Trump, whether willing to admit it or not, fostered young men like Mr. Roof. Adults like them only reinforce racist attitudes. They give permission to make fun of and bully others.To kill. I've never met a bad child. I've met lots of bad parents. Mr. Trump defended Russia who tampered with our voting system. Mr. Trump who never served a day in his life, said terrible things about John McCain of all people! To me that is treasonous. Donald Trump wouldn't last one week in the same situation as John McCain. And, yet fools still voted for him? EVERYONE should be outraged not just democrats but everyone. The press should be hanging all these men out to dry. I've given up on my subscription. It just doesn't feel like real reporting anymore. Republicans, democrats, men, women. Absolutely everyone should be outraged. But until "poor people rise up and take their share" men like Mr. Trump and Mr. Sessions will continue to govern and hurt the meek and innocent in this country.  All I know is I can hold my head up high because I did not vote for him. I love my country and the men and women that serve.  I do not support racism.  When men like the president elect, Mr. Session, Jesse Helms or Strom Thurmond pass on all I can say is good riddance.  They will not be missed.

The senators were too easy on Sessions. Any man who says that "Trump likes women" after Trump brags about sexually assault, has no place making important decisions that affect Americans. End of story.

A person who makes a statement that 'boys will be boys', is THE reason the Trumps continue to assault women.

Our only hope lies within the Democratic party. They are all that lies between us and the incredibly unfit cabinet that incredibly unfit President Elect Trump has chosen. Yet, here they are, our only hope, rolling over, kissing up and tossing softballs. Why is no one grilling Sessions on his separation of church and state stance? Why are Democrats so willing to believe that Sessions does not mean what he says and does not agree with groups he joins or is honored by? I am tired of this weak, useless Democratic party. It has been clear for years that the Republican party intends to lead us to a one party country and the Democrats are just clueless. I will be voting against them in mid term if they don't start to show some backbone ASAP.

Fun! Is Hillary Clinton a loser? Are liberals heads exploding? Did obama lose over 1,100 legislative seats?
Yes

"In a brief interview in the Times newsroom on Tuesday evening, Dean Baquet, the executive editor of The Times, said the paper would not publish the document because the allegations were “totally unsubstantiated.”

So let me get this straight -- the Times is refraining from publishing a report about Trump's possible collusion with Russia from the nation's intelligence agencies, but was willing to splash headlines about the reopening of the Clinton emaol investigation, which yielded nothing whatsoever, across the front page?

There weren't even charges then, and here there's plausible testimony to the effect that Trump committed treason. The double standard is grotesque.
All medias are printing this, NY is just following the train. Can't be the only one not sharing the story.
I no longer read paragraphs that begin with "So let me get this straight..."

But who has standing to bring charges?

Especially now that the Obama regime is leaving.

actually the situation is beginning to remind me of Nam where a majority were 'love it or leave it' until the bodies came back. that I fear is  where we are at. It will be 'give him a chance" until all of his economic promises that directly affect people fail. that is when a war is started just like bush in 2003. my fear is  that conservatives will take measures to ensure a permanent reign.
Republicans believe that the rules and protocols only apply to Democrats.

It should now be abundantly clear to those of us who consider ourselves progressives, and even those of us who label ourselves democrats but are not progressive enough - elected democrats DO NOT represent any of us.
The one chance senate dems had to grill a colleague, and they had enough ammunition, they chose to ignore the majority of voters and instead succumbed to the good ole boy network.
This is getting worse by the minute.

This is one of the reason why I no longer give any money to the Democrats but only to individual candidates like Bernie Sanders and Elizabeth Warren. The Democratic Party have become a gaggle of fairies who are afraid of their own shadow. Sessions is a RACIST, and all they can do is dance a jig around him. This is why the Republicans win. They play dirty and all the Democrats do is say, "Oh, my!" With a limp wrist. Makes me sick.

The clueless Democrats have followed the same playbook for decades, and NEVER has it worked. But they keep trying. Didn't Einstein say the definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over and expecting a different result?

It goes like this:

We in the Democratic Party are going to let the Republicans do whatever they want, no matter how stupid and/or painful for the public.

Then when it fails, we'll just take a big step back and point at them, say it was their idea. The public will rally to our side, and we'll be glowing in their adoration. We'll win the next election for sure.

Executed hundreds, perhaps thousands of times since 1980, here is a complete list of every time the plan has worked:

goodbye black lives matter, goodby holding cops accoutable, goodby planned parenthood, womens health, womens rights, and goodby to good sense and good government. hello to the republican 1% getting what they want from our society, everyone else be damned.

Jeff Sessions, You almost had me fooled, with your smile, southern charm & pixey demeanor. Then, when I was watching the replay of the people demonstrating, I saw him for what he was back then & continues to be, a true son of the South. The demonstrators were screaming about the injustice felt by their grandparents, parents, & other family members during the long period of segregation the African Americans had to endure. And what was the reformed senator doing, when the camera was on him, he was smiling, enjoying the unhappiness those people were feeling, for so long. He was having a good time, at their expense, sitting there in his $200 haircut & well tailored suit. - "That one may smile, and smile, and be a villain"— Hamlet Act 1, ... Keep smiling Jeff, you didn't fool me for long. Think about who selected you for A. G., explain that to your grandchildren! I served in the armed forces in the late 50's & I'm a proud New Yorker. It was there that I got my first inkling of what those good old boys from the south were all about. They smiled & patted you on the back, at the same time spewing the worst kind of bigotry I had ever heard. My wife danced with a black shipmate, we happen to be Caucasian, & the dance hall got still. I knew then that we were not in NY, we were in Washington, D.C., as far south as we had ever been. Warmest regards Senator, I'll be watching every decision you make, with interest & hope.
Like I said. Keep it up and you may just get a Republican Senate super majority in two years. You people just don't get it.

"In 2015, Mr. Sessions received the annual Keeper of the Flame award from the Center for Security Policy, a Washington think tank that promotes anti-Muslim conspiracy theories. Its founder, Frank Gaffney, has argued, among other things, that Mr. Obama is secretly a Muslim and that the crescent in the new logo of the Missile Defense Agency is a veiled sign that the United States has submitted to Islamic law."
Or perhaps because we are selling billions of dollars of military equipment to UAE, Qatar, and Saudi Arabia?
Not if we push to have Trump impeached for corruption.
